subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Brain
lead_paragraph: Theo Walcott was criticized by a former England winger, Chris Waddle, last week for lacking a "football brain," but few really know what goes on in the mind of players.
snippet: Theo Walcott was criticized by a former England winger, Chris Waddle, last week for lacking a "football brain," but few really know what goes on in the mind of players.
